articles.title: Lessons
articles.contents:
Making a website with R and distill
Lesson 1
Learning Objectives
Opening an account at Github
Opening a new repository and naming it
Getting code from Github and creating a new R project
Installing package (“distill”)
Create website
Step 1: Open R and change view settings and appearance.
Tools-> global options > R markdown > view in viewer pane
Step 2: Open an account with Github.
Create a new repository
